Country-Package.description: The name of the country package currently loaded in this API server

Country-Package-Version.description: The version of the country package currently loaded in this API server

age_qualification.description: Age qualification for New Zealand superannuation

SituationInput.example: No simulation example has been defined for this tax and benefit system. If you are the maintainer of Openfisca-Aotearoa, you can define an example by following this documentation: http://openfisca.org/doc/openfisca-web-api/config-openapi.html

SituationOutput.example: No simulation example has been defined for this tax and benefit system. If you are the maintainer of Openfisca-Aotearoa, you can define an example by following this documentation: http://openfisca.org/doc/openfisca-web-api/config-openapi.html

Trace.example: No simulation example has been defined for this tax and benefit system. If you are the maintainer of Openfisca-Aotearoa, you can define an example by following this documentation: http://openfisca.org/doc/openfisca-web-api/config-openapi.html

example.description: In receipt of payments under a Government-assisted scheme which the chief executive considers analogous to a main benefit under Socal Security Act

info.description: The OpenFisca Web API lets you get up-to-date information and formulas included in the Openfisca-Aotearoa legislation.
info.title: Openfisca-Aotearoa Web API

parameters.description: Describe the situation (persons and entities). Add the variable you wish to calculate in the proper entity, with null as the value. Learn more in our official documentation: https://openfisca.org/doc/openfisca-web-api/input-output-data
parameters.name: Situation

200.description: The calculation result is sent back in the response body

400.description: The request is invalid. Details about the error are sent back in the response body

404.description: A variable mentioned in the input situation does not exist in the loaded tax and benefit system. Details are sent back in the response body

200.description: The list of the entities as well as their information is sent back in the response body

parameters.description: ID of parameter. IDs can be obtained by enumerating the /parameters endpoint
parameters.name: parameterID

200.description: The requested parameter's information is sent back in the response body

404.description: The requested parameter does not exist

get.summary: Get information about a specific parameter

200.description: The list of parameters is sent back in the response body
The API documentation is sent back in the response body

get.summary: Provide the API documentation in an OpenAPI format

parameters.description: Describe the situation (persons and entities). Add the variable you wish to calculate in the proper entity, with null as the value.
parameters.name: Situation

200.description: The calculation details are sent back in the response body

400.description: The request is invalid. Details about the error are sent back in the response body

404.description: A variable mentioned in the input situation does not exist in the loaded tax and benefit system. Details are sent back in the response body

post.summary: Explore a simulation's steps in details.

parameters.description: ID of a variable. IDs can be obtained by enumerating the /variables endpoint.
parameters.name: variableID

200.description: The requested variable's information is sent back in the response body

404.description: The requested variable does not exist

get.summary: Get information about a specific variable

200.description: The list of variables is sent back in the response body

tags.description: A parameter is a numeric property of the legislation that can evolve over time.
tags.name: Parameters

tags.description: A variable depends on a person, or an entity (e.g. zip code, salary, income tax).
tags.name: Variables

tags.description: An entity is a person of a group of individuals (such as a household).
tags.name: Entities
